aboutUsDialog.title: About us
aboutUsDialog.content: TCG Pocket Tracker is a free and open-source project that aims to help you track your PokÃ©mon Pocket collection. It provides a user-friendly interface to manage your collection. The project is open-source and welcomes contributions from the community. If you have any questions or feedback, please reach out to us on our community forum or GitHub.
